description.value: Before a ballista can be fired, it must be loaded and aimed. It takes one Action to load the weapon, one Action to aim it, and one Action to fire it.
Before a cannon can be fired, it must be loaded and aimed. It takes one Action to load the weapon, one Action to aim it, and one Action to fire it.

languages.custom: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

description.value: A mangonel is a type of Catapult that hurls heavy projectiles in a high arc. This payload can hit Targets behind cover. Before the mangonel can be fired, it must be loaded and aimed. It takes two Actions to load the weapon, two Actions to aim it, and one Action to fire it.
It takes a minimum of four Medium Creatures to operate a ram. Because of the gallery roof, these operators have total cover against attacks from above.
It takes three Actions to fill a suspended cauldron and one Action to tip it.

The cauldron pours Boiling Oil onto a 10-foot-square area directly below it. Any creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A trebuchet is a powerful Catapult that throws its payload in a high arc, so it can hit Targets behind cover. Before the trebuchet can be fired, it must be loaded and aimed. It takes two Actions to load the weapon, two Actions to aim it, and one Action to fire it.
